attributes.action: make Diesel cheaper than Petrol but not by raising the cost of Petrol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like Diesel to be made cheaper than Petrol but not by raising the Price of petrol but to actually lower the price of Diesel as an incentive to use "greener fuels" which should be cheaper. Also make the fuel companies comply with this instantly.
